IssueType.name: Epic
IssueType.description: Created by Jira Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a big user story that needs to be broken down.

IssueType.name: Story
IssueType.description: Created by Jira Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.

IssueType.name: Task
IssueType.description: A task that needs to be done.

IssueType.name: Bug
IssueType.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

IssueType.name: Improvement
IssueType.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

IssueType.name: New Feature
IssueType.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
